about_the_game:
Welcome to Mono!, a comprehensive desktop card game simulator.

You and up to 7 other people can easily join and have a fun game of cards from list of included mods such as Spite & Malice, Pharaoh or Smoothie with each of them being able to be further customized to suit your needs.

Steam workshop support!
Looking for new modes to play with your friends? Then head to the steam workshop to find community creations where there's something for everyone!

Feeling creative or looking for more modes to play?
Mono supports easy moding tools expand the game and with comprehensive video and text tutorial and guides even a programing novice can import his favorite card game. You can then publish it on to the steam workshop for other people for them to also experience your creation!
